title: A Delegate From Carl Paladino’s Naughty List (Live From Cleveland)
description:
From Slate's Facebook live session on Tuesday afternoon – Seth Stevenson talks to Stefani Williams, a Utah delegate, about the threats she has received as a non-Trump supporting delegate at the Republican National Convention.
Trumpcast is brought to you by Ring. Get 50 dollars off the Ring of Security Kit, which includes the Ring Video Doorbell, when you go to Ring.com/TRUMPCAST.
